description: This file declares functions and includes necessary headers for low latency utility APIs, including parameter name retrieval, casting values, database interactions, and event publishing for latency measurement.

methods.name: GetParamName
methods.description: Retrieves the parameter name given a path.

methods.name: getLatencyParamName
methods.description: Returns the latency parameter name corresponding to a given low latency parameter.

methods.name: LowLatency_CastValueFromString
methods.description: Converts a string value to a specified type for low latency operations.

methods.name: LowLatency_GetValueFromDb
methods.description: Fetches a latency-related value from the database.

methods.name: LowLatency_SetValueToDb
methods.description: Sets a latency-related value into the database.
